text: Which slice to use.  Should be a number between 0 and the number of slices - 1.

Number of pieces to cut the volume into along each axis.  The
    total number of pieces, or slices, created will be the product of
    these numbers.  i.e., 2, 3, 4 will create 24 slices.

Adds a padding on the lower/upper side of the slices.  The slices
    start by dividing space evenly, but then this overlap will cause
    them to overlap with their neighbors.  The field exchange nodes
    use this overlap to determine what is communicated.
